item.title: Apache in GSoC
item.description: This is a place for collecting information about GSoC activities each year for historical tracking. Your help filling it out would be appreciated. 2022 Details ¶ Students accepted: 37 Students who passed final: 33 Contributor Project Mentors Status Abhinav Sinha Apache Custos Baremetal Deployment item.title: Apache in GSoC
item.description: This is a place for collecting information about GSoC activities each year for historical tracking. Your help filling it out would be appreciated. 2023 Details ¶ Students accepted: 26 Students who passed final: 25 Contributor Project Mentors Status Aibek [GSOC-242] Project proposal for Airflow Aizhamal, Pablo E Passed / Passed aroura Introduce New CRD ShardingSphereChaos tuichenchuxin, Maxwell Miao Passed / Passed chaminda-neluka GORA-708 Improve ArangoDB datastore and upgrade Hive and HBase dependencies Kevin Ratnasekera, Chanaka Passed / Passed Chaomei Yan GSoC Implement python client for RocketMQ 5.
